content:
Hey all! A couple of weeks ago I put together a central resource to navigate/summarize the broader component ecosystem: https://github.com/yoshuawuyts/awesome-wasm-components

GitHub - yoshuawuyts/awesome-wasm-components: A curated list of WebAssembly Component tooling and ready-to-use components.
A curated list of WebAssembly Component tooling and ready-to-use components. - yoshuawuyts/awesome-wasm-components
I wanted to invite y'all to look this over, and contribute additional entries or things that I didn't capture
I was thinking of at some point trying to upstream this to the BA; but I wasn't quite sure how/where to place it, and what its relationship to the existing docs should be.

This a wonderful resource -- I appreciate the way you scope Wasm comparatively to other platforms and the resources section is very helpful. I personally think this would all fit in well in the component docs. I am not sure exactly which pages each part would fall under -- i do like the one page nature of this.
